entry.title: Proposal: MultiBit as default desktop client on bitcoin.org
entry.summary: The context is a discussion between Jeff Garzik, Senior Software Engineer and open source evangelist at BitPay, and Nick Simpson about solutions for bandwidth issues. Nick suggests Cloudflare as a possible solution, but Jeff mentions that Cloudflare is becoming a single point of failure (SPOF) for the bitcoin community. Jeff also notes that solutions like Cloudflare, Sourceforge, and Github are supplements to self-hosted files, not replacements.
